class.name: InputEventAction
class.description: Contains a generic action which can be targeted from several types of inputs. Actions can be created from the [b]Input Map[/b] tab in the [b]Project > Project Settings[/b] menu. See [method Node._input].

method.name: set_strength
method.description: Sets the action's strength between 0 and 1. The event strength allows faking analog joypad motion events, by specifying how strongly the joypad axis is bent or pressed.

members.member: The action's name. Actions are accessed via this [String].
If [code]true[/code], the action's state is pressed. If [code]false[/code], the action's state is released.
